name: Pixel Gun Fighter
description:
Rifle VS Rugby

Can you imagine how the duel of rifle and rugby will be like? Here is the answer! Besides brave gunner, rugby player, building worker and the like are gathering here. The winner will be only one when these people encounter each other.
The gameplay is very simple. Tap the left button to dodge rival’s attack and tap the right button to shoot your rival. You will get a step back when you are shot. Be careful! Don’t fall into the water!

Features
-Simple operation. Very easy to play.
-Diverse featured characters and abundant weapons.
-Random barriers with endless fun.
